evidence.source_document: Order Granting in Part and Denying in Part Plaintiffs’ Motion for Preliminary Injunction
evidence.text: ORDER GRANTING IN PART AND DENYING IN PART PLAINTIFFS’ MOTION FOR PRELIMINARY INJUNCTION

extracted.value: Granted in part: Plaintiffs’ motion for a preliminary injunction was granted in part; Plaintiffs brought the motion; Order entered on 10/19/23.

evidence.source_document: Order Granting in Part and Denying in Part Plaintiffs’ Motion for Preliminary Injunction
evidence.text: ORDER GRANTING IN PART AND DENYING IN PART PLAINTIFFS’ MOTION FOR PRELIMINARY INJUNCTION

extracted.value: Denied in part: Plaintiffs’ motion for a preliminary injunction was denied in part; Plaintiffs brought the motion; Order entered on 10/19/23.

evidence.source_document: Order Granting Defendant's Motion to Dismiss
evidence.text: ORDER GRANTING DEFENDANT’S MOTION TO DISMISS

extracted.value: Granted: Defendant’s motion to dismiss was granted; Defendant (City of San Rafael) moved to dismiss; Order entered on 08/07/24.

evidence.source_document: Order Granting Plaintiffs’ Motion for a Temporary Restraining Order
evidence.text: the Court hereby GRANTS the motion for temporary restraining order. This order enjoins the implementation of sections 19.50 and 19.20.080(C) of the San Rafael Municipal Code by Defendants until the hearing on the preliminary injunction motion is held.

extracted.value: Court grants plaintiffs’ motion for a temporary restraining order (Docket No. 19) on August 16, 2023.

evidence.source_document: Order Conditionally Granting Defendant's Emergency Motion for Limited Relief From Injunction
evidence.text: At the end of the hearing, the Court conditionally granted the City’s motion. This order memorializes the Court’s rulings.

extracted.value: Court conditionally grants defendant’s emergency motion for limited relief (Docket No. 166) on June 14, 2024.

evidence.source_document: Order Clarifying Scope of Preliminary Injunction
evidence.text: This Order clarifies aspects of this Court’s preliminary injunction issued on October 19, 2023 (Docket No. 98). The temporary restraining order issued on August 16, 2023 (Docket No. 19) and extended and modified on September 7, 2023 (Docket No. 67) is no longer in effect.

extracted.value: Court clarifies the scope of the preliminary injunction issued on October 19, 2023 (Docket No. 98), indicating the temporary restraining order (Docket No. 19) and its extension are no longer in effect.
